alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Medina (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:29PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN MEDINA...NORTHEASTERN ASHLAND AND WAYNE COUNTIES... At 828 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Barberton to 7 miles northeast of Hayesville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Wooster, Wadsworth, Orrville, Rittman, Doylestown, Lodi, Creston, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Polk, Mount Eaton, Seville, Smithville, Apple Creek, Westfield Center, Marshallville, Jeromesville, Fredericksburg and Burbank. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
